constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Tolworth Key Area of Change
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Details required for Conditions 5 (Fire Safety Strategy), 6 (Waste and Recycling Facilities), 7 (Cycle Parking) and 10 (Landscaping Scheme) of planning permission 22/02388/FUL (Proposed erection of three storey rear extension and conversion of house into 3no. self-contained flats with associated landscaping, refuse/recycling facilities and cycle store.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted unacceptable details for the discharge of Condition 5 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission ref: 22/02388/FUL. Therefore, the submitted details would fail to ensure the safety of all building users in accordance with Policy D12 (Fire safety) of the London Plan 2021.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the discharge of Condition 6 (Waste and Recycling Facilities) of planning permission ref: 22/02388/FUL. Therefore, the proposal fails to ensure satisfactory refuse facilities in accordance with policy SI17 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the discharge of Condition 7 (Cycle Parking) of planning permission ref: 22/02388/FUL. Therefore, the submitted details would fail to ensure that appropriate opportunities to promote sustainable transport are taken up, in accordance with policy T5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS6 and DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the discharge of Condition 10 (Landscaping Scheme) of planning permission ref: 22/02388/FUL. Therefore, the proposal would fail to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
